summary: Fausta the Thief is an Imperial woman that favours the bow and ranged combat. While independant, she prefers hanging around the den of her kind at the Ragged Flagon. Has the skills of the Night and worships the Lady so she\'s adept of light on her feet.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/images/1902233-1377039960.jpg[/img]

Fausta the Thief is an Imperial woman that favours the bow and ranged combat. While independant, she prefers hanging
around the den of her kind at the Ragged Flagon. Has the skills of the Night and worships the Lady. 

[center][COLOR=#E36C09][FONT=Comic Sans MS][B][SIZE=5]Technical Description[/SIZE][/B][/FONT][/COLOR][/center]
My first custom NPC based on my previous main character. The specialty of this NPC is archery mostly along with one-hand. She will empty her quiver on a dragon if needed and if he lands she will engage in melee (if she has any melee weapons) after some shots. 

Before engaging an enemy, (if) once spotted she will conjure a familiar to assist or distract the foe first and then proceed to weapons.

She owns the Light Foot and Quick Shot Perks. 

[center][COLOR=#E36C09][FONT=Comic Sans MS][B][SIZE=5]Requirements[/SIZE][/B][/FONT][/COLOR][/center]

[color=red]NO REQUIREMENTS[/color]

This Mod is [color=orange]STANDALONE[/color] which means no other mods will be required.

All things necessary are inside it.


[img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/110/images/1902233-1377042403.jpg[/img]

[center][COLOR=#E36C09][SIZE=5][FONT=Comic Sans MS][B]Installation[/B][/FONT][/SIZE][/COLOR][/center]

Open le .zip file and drop its content on the Data folder.

Add File from Data in the NMM should work too. 

[color=orange]Uninstallation[/color]

1) Dismiss the follower
2) Unselect FAUSTANPC.esp
3) Delete/Unistall (if using NMM) FAUSTANPC.esp
4) Make sure these folders are deleted for complete elimination:
   
- meshes/actors/character/Fausta
-----meshes/actors/character/Fausta
-----meshes/actors/character/FaceGenData/FaceGeom/FaustaNPC.esp
-textures/actors/character/Fausta
-----textures/actors/character/FaceGenData/FaceTint/FaustaNPC.esp

[color=red]Issues[/color]

Not on my end*. You? Post issue. 

[u]IF you ended up fixing yourself or found a way, then tell us both the problem and the fix.[/u]

[b][color=orange]NOTES[/color][/b]

This follower was originally my main character. Some may say the hair is not \"lore friendly\", maybe too modern, however I don\'t see it that way. I think it shows a bit of a rebel \"personality\" to the character, fit for a thief. Not the best to show her eyes, but personally I like my characters shady =p 

*Her default armor is Leather Cuirass. If you put better equipment she will wear it, but if you want her to wear clothes of your taste and you have UFO, find and use the \"You could dress better\" dialogue option. After that you\'ll be able to take her defaults and put yours.

I also want to make other companions when schedule permits me.
Feel free to upload screenshots.

Liked this one?[color=orange]ENDORSE[/color] :)

[img]http://static1.nexusmods.com/110/images/1902233-1377044111.jpg[/img]

[b][color=orange]THANKS/CREDITS and ENDORSE:[/color][/b]

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/35267/?]SG Female Textures Renewal[/url] by
[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/users/2209393/?]hellosanta[/url]

[b][color=orange]Testers[/color][/b]

[center]---------------------------------------------------------------------------------Versions----------------------------------------------------------------------------------

1.0 - First release.[/center]
